data.Mail:: is obvious. Toaster being the generic term used to describe
data.description: build, maintain, and update a mail system
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Mail:: is obvious. Toaster being the generic term used to describe
    a system that's designed specifically for a single purpose. In this
    case, the project name evolved from FreeBSD Mail Toaster to simple
    Mail::Toaster as support for additional platforms has been added.
